description.value:
Requirements You are underwater and adjacent to a creature that is at least one size larger than you, has a swim Speed, and is willing to be your mount.

After working with aquatic beasts of burden for years, you have learned how to easily mount and dismount them. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Mount] the creature and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Command an Animal] to issue it an order of your choice.
